text: Mary Pendleton (1992). (10957454214) Mary C. Pendleton (born June 15, 1940, Jefferson County, Kentucky) is a retired American diplomat who was the first American ambassador to Moldova after it gained independence from the Soviet Union (1992 until 1995)., Pendleton graduated from Spalding University (B.A., 1962) and Indiana University (M.A., 1969). ==References== Category:American women ambassadors Category:People from Jefferson County, Kentucky Category:Spalding University alumni Category:Indiana University alumni Category:1940 births Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Moldova Category:Living people
title: Mary Pendleton
